Fitness buddy challenge: pair up employees and challenge them to workout together, tracking progress and sharing tips and advice to keep each other motivated.
Yoga at work: introduce a weekly yoga class during lunch breaks, led by a certified instructor, to help employees relax, stretch, and improve flexibility.
Step challenges: create a friendly competition among employees by setting step goals, tracking progress, and rewarding the top step-taker with prizes or recognition.
Wellness workshops: organize workshops on various wellness topics such as nutrition, stress management, and mindfulness, featuring guest speakers or internal experts.

Fitness-themed team-building events: plan fun fitness-related events such as a charity run, a fitness scavenger hunt, or a team yoga competition to encourage employees to get active and bond with colleagues.
